name: HELIOPOLIS
description:
Story

On 1985, genius entrepreneur, successful businessman and known occultist Francisco de Piria laid the fundation stone for his most ambitious project yet.

Heliopolis, his own city, built upon powerful ley lines and following the pattern ot the three of life, a living sigil for the protection of the secrets he kept. Towering over the city, his own castle kept his doors shut, rumors spreading about strange ocurrences and chilling screams coming from the basement, where only Piria was allowed.

You, as Piria´s Apprentice, must take the final ordeal in order to become a Master. To prove your worth, you mast face each of the four elemental chambers.


Credits

- Horror Engine by tansuergene

- Infinty Blade: Effects by EpicGames

- City of Brass: Props by Uppercut Games

- Meshes, Surfaces and Decals from Megascans

- Argentino hotel statue by Nicolas Silveira

- Pedestal by Lazaran

- Old Wooden Door by Ellie3D

- Stylized Character Pedestal by Agustin Hönnun

- Wine Vessel by Minneapolis Institute of Art

- Wooden Bed by shedmon
